plugin.author: Shopgate GmbH

changelog.changes: - provide ZIP archives that can be uploaded and installed using the Shopware 5 plugin manager

plugin.description: Das Shopgate Ship-from-Store-Plugin erm√∂glicht die Synchronisierung von Bestellungen und den Import des kumulierten Lagerbestands von Shopgate.
The Shopgate Ship-from-Store plugin enables order sync and importing the cumulated inventory from Shopgate.
